name: Golden Troupe
flower_description: A flower constructed out of clam, mother-of-pearl, and gold leaf. It blooms proudly.
feather_description: A gold feather made using silver and gold filigree. A crystal-clear sapphire is mounted atop it.
sand_description: This lovely sundial is inlaid with silver and gold. It seems that time has stopped flowing atop its dial plate.
goblet_description: An ancient silver urn that was once filled with fine wine as red as rubies. Now, it contains nothing but bitter seawater.
circlet_description: An ancient crown that resembles a stage prop more than it does some suzerain's headgear.
four_pc_bonus: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 25%. Additionally, when not on the field, Elemental Skill DMG will be further increased by 25%. This effect will be cleared 2s after taking the field.
